name: Lumby (Old Game Demos)
description:
So, heres the thing. This game is cancelled and isn't being made as of now. I wanna come back to the project sometime in the future.

Lumby was always a project I have love in my heart for, i designed him while bored in a 6th grade art class one day.

Anyway, enough with the touchy stuff and my personal dreams and asperations.

Lumby is a game where you play as an aspiring lumberjack. I did have a story for the game, but since these demos are nothing more than a few levels, I'd rather keep them storyless for now.

QUICK DISCLAIMER!

I know the game is cancelled, but please don't steal or ask me for the rights to this project to continue it yourself. As I am willing to come back to this idea!
